long_description: When you need maximum mobility but want a little extra length, the women's Sugoi Moxie shorts offer comfortable coverage with a long inseam and smooth stretch to keep up with your every move. Lightweight, durable nylon/spandex material wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly, keeping you comfortable when you start to perspire. Shorts feature a snug, supportive fit that hugs the body without being too tight; wide, smooth waistband lies flat against skin. The women's Sugoi Moxie shorts feature an inside key pocket at waist. 15 in. inseam offers complete coverage. Closeout.
short_description: When you need maximum mobility but want a little extra length, the women's Sugoi Moxie shorts offer comfortable coverage with a long inseam and smooth stretch to keep up with your every move.
